title: Commemorative Mural of the Centenary of UTFPR
description: The Federal Technological University of Paraná celebrated its 100th anniversary on September 23, 2009. Created as the School of Apprentice Craftsmen in 1909.

title: A bust of a warrior
description: Sketch approx. 50 x 70cm, pencil on painted wall. Drawing based on Da Vinci's masterpiece 'A bust of a warrior in profile to left'.

title: Arcimboldo study
description: Sketch approx. 30 x 30cm, pencil on paper. Drawing based on Arcimboldo's masterpiece 'Summer'. Oil on wood, 1563.

title: Farol do Saber e Base Paranismo
description: 3D printed miniature of Farol do Saber library with paranista-themed relief base, presented to Curitiba Mayor Rafael Greca. Commemorative piece for the inauguration of the first "Farol do Saber e Inovação" (2017), inspired by the Library of Alexandria.
alt: Curitiba city Mayor holding 3D printed model of Farol do Saber library

title: Ciência na Caixa Logo
description: Logo design study for science education project. Visual identity exploration combining geometric forms with educational concepts.
alt: Ciência na Caixa logo design study

title: Bionic Hand
description: 3D model of bionic hand prosthesis visualized in Meshmixer. Digital modeling project exploring mechanical design and human anatomy.
